thread.title: Nietes, Viloria train together for October 17th bouts
thread.title_full: Nietes, Viloria train together for October 17th bouts

author: ABS-CBN Sports
title: Nietes, Viloria train together for October 17th bouts
text:
Nietes, Viloria train together for October 17th bouts ABS-CBN Sports Posted at 10/11/2015 12:36 AM Oct 7, 2015 at 1:22pm PDT 
As an old fighting adage goes, “iron sharpens iron.” 
This has been the mindset of Filipino boxers Donnie Nietes and Brian Viloria, who have been training alongside each other for their respective fights on October 17th in the United States. 
Nietes will be headlining Pinoy Pride 33: Philippines vs. The World, which is ALA Promotions’ first ever US event. He will be defending his WBO light flyweight title for the eighth consecutive time against Mexico’s Juan “Pinky” Alejo. The card will be held at the StubHub Center in Carson, California. Oct 6, 2015 at 10:59pm PDT 
This story was originally published on the ABS-CBN Sports website 
For more sports coverage, visit ABS-CBN Sports
